backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profile storage with authorization checks and a contact form submission list accessible only to admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence metadata mapping site features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions using OKLCH colors for light/dark modes and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling hash-based navigation between the marketing site and the admin inquiries page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guard component enforcing admin-only access with loading, login, and access-denied states.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Validated contact form with success state and backend submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with branding, quick links, contact details, and social icons, including smooth-scroll handlers.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Implements a sticky header with desktop and mobile navigation using smooth scrolling and a responsive sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: Displays an About section with academy values, philosophy, and styled content cards.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Provides contact info cards and embeds a contact form within a two-column layout.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/FA: Renders an FAQ section using an accordion populated with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ho: Creates a hero section with background images, CTAs that scroll to sections, and highlight stats.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/In: Renders an instructors section listing instructor profiles with names, ranks, specialties, and bios using card components.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Pr: Displays membership pricing plans with features, highlighting the most popular option and including a scroll-to-contact button.
Shows a list of martial arts programs with icons, descriptions, and feature lists, including a highlighted competition team option.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Sc: Provides a weekly class schedule rendered in cards, listing times, programs, and levels for each day.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Fetches and sorts contact form submissions for admins using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identities, and related status flags.
Provides a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor and refresh inquiry data on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus light and dark theme OKLCH CSS variables and global typography/utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping App with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInquiries.tsx: Admin page that loads, displays, and manages contact inquiries with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, shadows, animations, and theme tokens using OKLCH variables and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, features, requirements, and image needs for the taekwondo website.
